messages.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression 'Answer: ([A-Za-z ]+,\s*)*[A-Za-z ]+'

You want to organize a fundraiser with 16 socialites. Paul is connected to Bob, Nick, Sherry, and John. Bob is connected to Paul, Nick, Sherry, and Rose. Nick is connected to Paul, Bob, Sherry and Amanda. Sherry is also connected to Paul, Bob, Nick, and William. Amanda is connected to Peter, John, Daisy, and Nick. Peter is connected to Amanda, John, Daisy, and Adam. John is connected to Paul, Daisy, Peter, and Amanda. Daisy is also connected to Amanda, Peter, John, and Maggie. Alisa is connected to Maggie, Jennifer, Adam, and Russell. Maggie is connected to Alisha, Jennifer, Daisy, and Adam. Jennifer is connected to Andrew, Alisha, Adam, and Maggie. Adam is also connected to Alisha, Maggie, Jennifer, and Peter. Andrew is connected to William, Russell, Rose, and Jennifer. William is connected to Sherry, Andrew, Russell, Rose. Russell is connected to Andrew, William, Rose, and Alsiha. Rose is also connected to Andrew, William, Russell, and Bob.  What is the shortest path from Daisy to Peter? Please list the names in order, separated by commas.

== Aptitude round ==
Two other stages, aptitude and Facebook evaluation are conducted to check the suitability of a candidate to join the organization. The candidate who clears the MCQ round is sent to a coding round with a link of 3 questions to be completed in a duration of 2 hours. The aptitude round comprises three parts:

1. Coding Round - This is a one-on-one coding round with the recruiter where the candidate is expected to be proficient in data structures and algorithms. The basic level PH test (for phones) is used as a filter prior to the interview rounds.

2. Design round - This part is specific to back-end or front-end candidates. They are given frontend specific tasks or backend specific tasks regarding the role they have applied for. The evaluation of the solution is carried through one or more code reviews (depending on the complexity and depth of the solution) and any plagiarized code or solution is disqualified.

3. System design round - This round is similar to the previous design round and consists of the biggest and broadest system design question which has to be completed within a duration of 40 min.

== Hiring ==
Candidates are

== Aptitude round ==
Two other stages, aptitude and Facebook evaluation are conducted to check the suitability of a candidate to join the organization. The candidate who clears the MCQ round is sent to a coding round with a link of 3 questions to be completed in a duration of 2 hours. The aptitude round comprises three parts:

1. Coding Round - This is a one-on-one coding round with the recruiter where the candidate is expected to be proficient in data structures and algorithms. The basic level PH test (for phones) is used as a filter prior to the interview rounds.

2. Design round - This part is specific to back-end or front-end candidates. They are given frontend specific tasks or backend specific tasks regarding the role they have applied for. The evaluation of the solution is carried through one or more code reviews (depending on the complexity and depth of the solution) and any plagiarized code or solution is disqualified.

3. System design round - This round is similar to the previous design round and consists of the biggest and broadest system design question which has to be completed within a duration of 40 min.
